classes.name: Barbarian
classes.description: High-health warrior that uses rage to power its attacks.

classes.name: Bard
classes.description: Versatile performer who uses magic and music to inspire allies.

classes.name: Cleric
classes.description: Divine spellcaster capable of healing and powerful magic.

classes.name: Druid
classes.description: Nature-based spellcaster who can shapechange into animals.

classes.name: Fighter
classes.description: Master of weapons and armor, highly customizable for combat.

classes.name: Monk
classes.description: High-mobility unarmed combatant with mystical defenses.

classes.name: Paladin
classes.description: Holy warrior who defends the weak and strikes down evil.

classes.name: Ranger
classes.description: Skilled outdoorsman and hunter, specializing in specific foes.

classes.name: Rogue
classes.description: Stealth and trap expert specializing in sneak attacks.

classes.name: Sorcerer
classes.description: Innate spellcaster who draws power from their bloodline.

classes.name: Wizard
classes.description: Academic spellcaster who studies ancient tomes of power.

classes.name: Alchemist
classes.description: Expert in potions and bombs, uses mutagens to boost power.

classes.name: Cavalier
classes.description: Mounted warrior dedicated to a chivalric order and its tenets.

classes.name: Gunslinger
classes.description: Firearms expert who uses grit to perform deadly deeds.

classes.name: Inquisitor
classes.description: Divine agent who uses judgments and banishments to hunt their prey.

classes.name: Magus
classes.description: Blends arcane magic and weapon attacks into a single strike.

classes.name: Omdura
classes.description: Divine leader who inspires allies through orisons and fervor.

classes.name: Oracle
classes.description: Mystery-driven divine caster with a powerful thematic curse.

classes.name: Shifter
classes.description: Martial class focused on animalistic aspects and transformations.

classes.name: Summoner
classes.description: Conjures a powerful, customizable eidolon to fight alongside them.

classes.name: Vampire Hunter
classes.description: Specialized combatant trained to hunt and destroy undead.

classes.name: Vigilante
classes.description: Lives a double life, alternating between social and hero identities.

classes.name: Witch
classes.description: Wielder of hexes and patron magic, aided by a familiar.

classes.name: Arcanist
classes.description: Combines the flexibility of a sorcerer with a wizard's study.

classes.name: Bloodrager
classes.description: Merges the barbarian's rage with sorcerous bloodline magic.

classes.name: Brawler
classes.description: Unarmed combatant who adapts their combat style on the fly.

classes.name: Hunter
classes.description: Master of coordinated teamwork alongside an animal companion.

classes.name: Investigator
classes.description: Alchemist + Rogue: Uses 'Inspiration' to solve problems and fight.

classes.name: Shaman
classes.description: Draws power from spirits and wandering hexes for variable utility.

classes.name: Skald
classes.description: Versatile warrior-poet who shares supernatural rage with allies.

classes.name: Slayer
classes.description: Ranger + Rogue: A cold, efficient killer focused on studied targets.

classes.name: Swashbuckler
classes.description: Flamboyant duelist who uses panache to outmaneuver foes.

classes.name: Warpriest
classes.description: Cleric + Fighter: Uses fervor to cast spells while fighting.

classes.name: Kineticist
classes.description: Channels raw elemental power through their own physical body.

classes.name: Medium
classes.description: Channels spirits from the legendary past to gain their abilities.

classes.name: Mesmerist
classes.description: Master of mental influence, weakening foes with hypnotic stares.

classes.name: Occultist
classes.description: Uses psychic implements to channel power from historical objects.

classes.name: Psychic
classes.description: Uses pure mental prowess to cast thought and emotion-based spells.

classes.name: Spiritualist
classes.description: Bound to a phantom from the Ethereal Plane that protects them.
